description: CCoV belongs to species Alphacoronavirus 1, genus Alphacoronavirus, which is same to feline coronavirus (FCoV), transmissible gastroenteritis virus (TGEV) and porcine respiratory coronavirus (PRCoV). In 2003, canine coronavirus was newly recognized as respiratory tract virus. CCoV is a single-stranded, positive-sense RNA virus that belongs to the genus Alphacoronavirus.
name: Canine Coronavirus (CCoV) Antibodies and Antigens
